page.title: 19THE NURSERY PLAYGROUND
page.content: Near the Northend Road there is a small nursery playground. This playground is for children aged about four to ten years. It has no rubbish-bins and no caretaker. There are not many things to play on, which is not very interesting for children of that age. There is a lot of rubbish lying on the ground such as glass, crisp packets etc.. There are not many flowers so it is unattractive to people passing by. We wrote to the Council to desribe the state of the playground and in two weeks time they had swept it and planted flowers _ but there are still no litter-bins !
